tldr: Affected versions of the package allow Cross-site Scripting (XSS). Setting `innerHTML` outside of `lwc:inner-html` is possible, which becomes a vulnerability if a proper sanitizing hook is not used.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@lwc/shared` library to the patch version.
